abstract: The different results for the luxury chain and the discounter reflect a widening gulf among retailers.
snippet: The different results for the luxury chain and the discounter reflect a widening gulf among retailers.
lead_paragraph: The widening gulf between luxury and discount retailers could not have been more obvious on Tuesday. Saks posted a first-quarter loss while the TJX Companies  which owns the T. J. Maxx and Marshalls chains  reported the strongest quarterly results ever.

headline.main: Saks Posts Loss; TJX, a Discounter, Shows a Profit
headline.print_headline: Saks Posts Loss; TJX, a Discounter, Shows a Profit
